summary.description: > LOW CONFIDENCE! | > CORRECT NAME OF TOOL COULD ALSO BE 'STORM' (bio.tools/storm), 'cholesterol-sensitive', 'mAb35-crosslinked', 'nAChRs' | Antibody-induced crosslinking and cholesterol-sensitive, anomalous diffusion of nicotinic acetylcholine receptors | Antibody-induced crosslinking immobilizes acetylcholine receptors. Mobile receptors exhibit anomalous, cholesterol-sensitive diffusion and clustering | Synaptic strength depends on the number of cell-surface neurotransmitter receptors in dynamic equilibrium with intracellular pools
